amendment.description: To provide funds to establish additional Northern Border Air Wings, offset through reductions in Function 920.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3140 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3140 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S2261-2262; text: CR S2261-2262) To provide funds to establish additional Northern Border Air Wings, offset through reductions in Function 920.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3140 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3140 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Levin.
